reference.title: lcObjectivesStem
reference.shortdesc: The <lcObjectivesStem> provides a leading sentence to introduce a list of learning objectives.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <learningOverview id="overview"> <title>Learning Overview topic</title> <learningOverviewbody> <lcObjectives> <title>Objectives</title> <lcObjectivesStem>When you complete this lesson, you'll know how to do the following:</lcObjectivesStem> <lcObjectivesList> <lcObjective>Creating a good learning overview topic.</lcObjective> <lcObjective>Identifying clear learning objectives.</lcObjective> <lcObjective>Adding good test items to assess knowledge gained.</lcObjective> </lcObjectivesList> </lcObjectives> </learningOverviewbody> </learningOverview>
